name: Spotify
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 23 keyboard shortcuts found in Spotify

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 23 keyboard shortcuts found in Spotify

cards.title: General I
cards.body:
| Shortcut         | Action                  |
| ---------------- | ----------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `N`       | Create new playlist     |
| `Ctrl` `X`       | Cut                     |
| `Ctrl` `C`       | Copy                    |
| `Ctrl` `Alt` `C` | Copy (alternative link) |
| `Ctrl` `V`       | Paste                   |
| `Del`            | Delete                  |
| `Ctrl` `A`       | Select all              |
| `Space`          | Play/pause              |
| `Ctrl` `Right`   | Next track              |
| `Ctrl` `Left`    | Previous track          |
| `Ctrl` `Up`      | Volume up               |

cards.title: General II
cards.body:
| Shortcut              | Action                          |
| --------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `Down`         | Volume down                     |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Down` | Mute                            |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Up`   | Max volume                      |
| `F1`                  | Show help                       |
| `Ctrl` `F`            | Filter (in Songs and Playlists) |
| `Ctrl` `L`            | Give focus to search field      |
| `Alt` `Left`          | Go back                         |
| `Alt` `Right`         | Go forward                      |
| `Enter`               | Play selected row               |
| `Ctrl` `P`            | Preferences                     |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `W`    | Logout active user              |
| `Alt` `F4`            | Quit                            |
